resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Use the Edinburgh Bus Tracker app to add bookmarks first

"No bookmarks

Press the 'map' button above to view a map of stops.

From the map touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."
"Lothian's website no longer supports future departures beyond the current day :("

"Changes:
 * Fix Honeycomb crash.
 * Fix bookmark arrival times not showing bookmark name.
 * Fix homescreen icon not working until removed+re-added (sorry!).
 * Fix map not moving to your location when My Location selected.
 * Redraw icon in SVG.
 * Total code refactoring to ease new feature development.
 * Homescreen shortcuts are now supported.
"
